name: Under your wings
description:
Made for Mini Jam #65 using the theme Abandonment. Game's prototype is near complete, we did run a little short on time. ;P

A game by rookie jammers Eva, Fabian, Sascha and Torben.
-------------------------

You are a kid who is visiting the fair with his parents.
Your objective is to manage your enthusiasm (blue bar) by visiting shiny objects, however if you stray too far away from your parent, you will get lonely and scared and lose the game!

Controls:
WSAD - Move
mouse - look around
Space - run

Notes:
The game's restart is possibly broken. Try to restart the game entirely (should take 5 seconds or so) if you face any issues.
